def count_beautiful_ways(arr):
    unique_elements = set(arr)
    n = len(unique_elements)
    return n * (n - 1) / 2

def count_beautiful_ways(arr):
    unique_elements = set(arr)
    n = len(unique_elements)
    return n * (n - 1) * 2
